name: Art Hub Notion Template
description: The Art Hub is a centralized space designed for artists to organize their creative process. You can manage your artwork, inspiration, and references in one place.Key features: A gallery view to track multiple art projects with details such as status, references, and progress. A built-in to-do list, shopping list, and schedule for streamlined productivity. Dedicated sections for storing references, brief details, and notes for each project, making it easier to stay organized and inspired. With a
features: A gallery view to track multiple art projects with details such as status, references, and progress.; A built-in to-do list, shopping list, and schedule for streamlined productivity.; Dedicated sections for storing references, brief details, and notes for each project, making it easier to stay organized and inspired.
